title: Knight’s Tour
description: A Knight’s Tour is a sequence of moves of a knight on a chessboard such that the knight visits every square exactly once. If the knight ends on a square that is one knight's move from the beginning square (so that it could tour the board again immediately, following the same path), the tour is closed (or re-entrant); otherwise, it is open.
defaultMessage: Click or tap a square and start solving!
wrongBoardSizeMessage: The board size should be 5 by 5 or bigger.
